name.description: Service name for the Confluent Enterprise Replicator

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin (e.g., [{"key": "key_1", "value": "value_1"}, {"key": "key_2", "value": "value_2"}])

user.description: The user that the service will run as.
user.title: User

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each connect worker instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each connect worker instance.

heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for connect worker task; should be ~256MB less than total memory for the instance.

role.description: Deploy connect worker only on nodes with this role.

kafka-service.description: Target Apache Kafka by Confluent service to which these tasks will connect.

zookeeper-connect.description: Zookeeper Connect string for service cluster. Format is comma-separated list of <zk-host>:<zkport>/<kservice>

schema-registry-service.description: Schema Registry service to be used by connect workers. The named VIP associated with this service will be used to specify the converter-schema-registry-url's

storage-topic.description: Storage topic used to for replicator offset, config and status topic
